official_title: A bill prohibiting certain pooling agreements among rail carriers for the acquisition of assets, and for other purposes.
short_title: Fairness in Rail Car Purchasing Act

summary.text: Fairness in Rail Car Purchasing Act - Prohibits the Interstate Commerce Commission from approving any agreement among rail carriers regarding the joint acquisition of assets to be pooled by such carriers.

titles.title: Fairness in Rail Car Purchasing Act
A bill prohibiting certain pooling agreements among rail carriers for the acquisition of assets, and for other purposes.
